verses.plain: How amiable are thy tabernacles, O LORD of hosts!
My soul longeth, yea, even fainteth for the courts of the LORD: my heart and my flesh crieth out for the living God.

tokens.t: My soul longeth, yea, even fainteth for the courts of the
: my heart and my flesh crieth out for the living God.

verses.plain: Yea, the sparrow hath found an house, and the swallow a nest for herself, where she may lay her young, even thine altars, O LORD of hosts, my King, and my God.

tokens.t: Yea, the sparrow hath found an house, and the swallow a nest for herself, where she may lay her young,
of hosts, my King, and my God.

verses.plain: Blessed are they that dwell in thy house: they will be still praising thee. Selah.

tokens.t: they that dwell in thy house: they will be still praising thee. Selah.

verses.plain: Blessed is the man whose strength is in thee; in whose heart are the ways of them.
Who passing through the valley of Baca make it a well; the rain also filleth the pools.

tokens.t: passing through the valley of Baca make it a well; the rain also filleth the pools.

verses.plain: They go from strength to strength, every one of them in Zion appeareth before God.

tokens.t: They go from strength to strength,

verses.plain: O LORD God of hosts, hear my prayer: give ear, O God of Jacob. Selah.

tokens.t: God of hosts, hear my prayer: give ear, O God of Jacob. Selah.

verses.plain: Behold, O God our shield, and look upon the face of thine anointed.

tokens.t: Behold, O God our shield, and look upon the face of thine anointed.

verses.plain: For a day in thy courts is better than a thousand. I had rather be a doorkeeper in the house of my God, than to dwell in the tents of wickedness.

tokens.t: For a day in thy courts
better than a thousand. I had rather be a doorkeeper in the house of my God, than to dwell in the tents of wickedness.

verses.plain: For the LORD God is a sun and shield: the LORD will give grace and glory: no good thing will he withhold from them that walk uprightly.

tokens.t: will give grace and glory: no good
will he withhold from them that walk uprightly.

verses.plain: O LORD of hosts, blessed is the man that trusteth in thee.

tokens.t: the man that trusteth in thee.

footnotes.text: for the sons: or, of the sons
Baca…: or, mulberry trees make him a well, etc
strength to…: or, company to company
I had…: Heb. I would choose rather to sit at the threshold
